name: Inlexa – Text Assistant for Writing Inclusive Texts
author: Nelio Software

sections.description:
Inlexa is a writing assistant that analyzes the text you write in Gutenberg and suggests alternatives to make it more diverse and inclusive. Offered as an online service, it processes the content of your site in our cloud and runs an inclusivity analysis to determine how to improve your copy. You can read our Privacy Policy and our Terms and Conditions (both in Spanish) to better understand how Inlexa works.

You’ll need an active subscription to use Inlexa. Take a look at our website to know more about the service. Supported Languages: Spanish and Catalan.
sections.installation:
Installation through the WordPress Dashboard

  1. Login to your WordPress admin.
  2. Click on the plugins tab.
  3. Click the Add New button.
  4. Search for “Inlexa.”
  5. Look for our plugin, click “Install Now” and then “Activate.”
  6. Once the plugin is installed and active, go to Settings » Inlexa Account and log in using the Access Key we’ve sent you upon subscription.

And that’s it! You can now use Inlexa to craft more inclusive content.

Inlexa Premium

In order to use Inlexa, you’ll need an active subscription. Get yours at inlexa.es. Once you complete the checkout process, you’ll receive an e-mail with an Access Key. Use it in the plugin as described in our Knowledge Base.

I successfully installed the plugin. What should I do now?

You’ll find a detailed and comprehensive guide (in Spanish) in our website with all the information you need on how to use Inlexa efficiently.
sections.faq:
Why do I need Inlexa?

Language plays an important role in describing the reality around us: if you can’t name something, it’s like it doesn’t exist. By being conscious of your wording, you’ll contribute to a fairer society where each individual gets the attention and respect they deserve. Inlexa will help you to show everybody you’re committed to inclusivity and gender-equality.

Is Inlexa a paid plugin?

Inlexa is a paid service that analyzes your text in our cloud and suggests several changes to improve it. The plugin itself is free, but it only serves as a bridge between your WordPress site and our cloud. That is, you’ll need an active subscription to use it.

Can I cancel my subscription at any time?

Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time.

More questions?

If you have more questions, just take a look at our Knowledge Base, where you’ll find all the information you need.

short_description: A writing assistant that uses AI to help you communicate with people respectfully using a diverse and inclusive language
description:
Inlexa is a writing assistant that analyzes the text you write in Gutenberg and suggests alternatives to make it more diverse and inclusive. Offered as an online service, it processes the content of your site in our cloud and runs an inclusivity analysis to determine how to improve your copy. You can read our Privacy Policy and our Terms and Conditions (both in Spanish) to better understand how Inlexa works.

You’ll need an active subscription to use Inlexa. Take a look at our website to know more about the service. Supported Languages: Spanish and Catalan.

screenshots.caption: Inclusivity Suggestions. After installing Inlexa, a new Gutenberg plugin will show up in your editor. In the sidebar, you’ll see a list of suggestions on how to make the content of your page or post more inclusive.
Login Screen. In Settings » Inlexa Account, there’s the login form. Use the Access Token we’ve sent you via email to log into Inlexa, thus enabling the Gutenberg plugin.
